Headline: #85 Central Temporary Northbound Reroute near Central/Fullerton-Altgeld
ShortDescription: NB 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Fullerton, Austin, Diversey and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Fullerton-Altgeld.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Fullerton, Austin, Diversey and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Fullerton-Altgeld.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute near Montrose/Forest Preserve
ShortDescription: 78 buses temp. rerouted WB: Montrose, Narragansett, Irving Pk, Harlem, Terminal; EB: Montrose, Irving Pk, Narragansett and Montrose near Montrose/Forest Prsrv.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Montrose/Forest Preserve.

Westbound buses will operate via Montrose, Narragansett, Irving Park, Harlem, into the Terminal.

Eastbound buses will operate via Montrose, Irving Park, Narragansett and Montrose.

Allow extra travel time.
